text: Motion
Little girl
Motion
Hey! Hey!
Wait, don't ignore me, Mikoto-chan!!
─Huh, me...?
I've been calling out to you for a while, you know!
Did you, by any chance, pretend not to notice?

Nah,
I just didn't think it was me...
Um... well, alright.

I eavesdropped on your lesson just now...
Mikoto, you're really good at the piano after all!

I've been stuck playing the same songs over and over!
I'm getting bored of it.
─Oh, um... could you hear my piano during the lesson?
Since my lesson time is right before yours.

─I want to be able to play more
difficult and cool songs!
So, can you give me some tips on how to improve?

Um... why?
Why do you want to get better?

Uh...
Well, you see...
Motion
Oh, I remembered.
Why did I suddenly remember that now?
